attributes.action: Actually take note of online petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever since this option became available to the public we have created petitions, and every one so far has been ignored, fuel duty, immigration, tax.

We, the people are supposed to be the ones running the country, and in a democratic society everyone's voice is supposed to count, but all democracy means at the moment is a bunch of idiots conjuring up more and more taxes. When are we going to see some change? When is public oppinion going to matter?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
